entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Chipewyan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:01 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 03:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

Temperature: -26.8°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:10 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
